name: Robo Monster Hunt
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 33 (Theme: You are the Monster)

You are an evil robotic wolf that steals sheep from the equally insufferable robotic farmers.

Collect all the sheep in the level while avoiding the farmers keen shotgun aim.

Credits:
Ben Wilson (Code, Graphics) - http://www.zerofifty.one/
Daniel Cohen (Code, Graphics) - https://twitter.com/faemir
Kathryn Zalecka (Concept Art, Graphics) - http://kathrynzalecka.com/
